tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DatasetCleaning (
  dataset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  dataset_name STRING,
  data_source STRING,
  cleaning_method STRING,
  cleaned_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE DataCleaning (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   dataset_id INT,
   cleaning_steps TEXT,
   cleaned_data JSON,
   cleaning_status BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE Preprocessing (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   dataset_id INT,
   preprocessing_steps TEXT,
   preprocessed_data JSON,
   processing_status BOOLEAN);

CREATE TABLE StatisticalAnalysis (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   dataset_id INT,
   analysis_steps TEXT,
   analysis_results JSON);

CREATE TABLE Datasets (
    dataset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name STRING,
    source STRING,
    size_bytes INT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);
